titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the king, upon the nineteenth of March, 1670/1 by John Lord Bishop of Chester.
titleStmt.author: Wilkins, John, 1614-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Maxwell for Sa. Gellibrand ...,

notesStmt.note: This item can be found at reel 950:38 identified as Wing W2211 and at reel 1038:24 identified as Wing P1008 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).

Wing attributed this work to both John Pearson and John Wilkins. Wilkins was bishop of Chester 1668-1672, when he died and was succeeded by John Pearson--cf. Haydn, J. Book of dignities, 1894,1970, p. 477.
Reproduction of originals in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York and Huntington Library.
